# The `InstRef` Class Reference

<DoxygenPage pluginConfig={pluginConfig}>

An <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/mca/instref">InstRef</a> contains both a <a href="/docs/api/structs/llvm/mca/sourcemgr">SourceMgr</a> index and <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/mca/instruction">Instruction</a> pair. <a href="#details">More...</a>

## Description {#details}

An <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/mca/instref">InstRef</a> contains both a <a href="/docs/api/structs/llvm/mca/sourcemgr">SourceMgr</a> index and <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/mca/instruction">Instruction</a> pair.

The index is used as a unique identifier for the instruction. MCA will make use of this index as a key throughout MCA.

Definition at line 720 of file <a href="/docs/api/files/include/include/llvm/include/llvm/mca/instruction-h">Instruction.h</a>.
